taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus eubatus;section flagellares;species licens;

treatment.description: Habitally like nos. 55 and 56; canes rather slender, bearing about 20 prickles per dm.; leaves membranaceous, with sharp simple or double serration, the leaflets tapering to long-acuminate tips; corymb racemiform as in no. 55, with 5-17 glandular-villous pedicels, most of the pedicels much exceeding the small bracts.
treatment.habitat_elevation_distribution_or_ecolog: Openings, thickets and borders of woods, sw. Que. to s. Mich.
